Original: Itâ€™s time to build American AI. Collin McCune @Collin_McCune The EO is an incredibly important first step â€“ and thank you to @POTUS , @DavidSacks , @mkratsios47 , and @sriramk for their leadership. But the vacuum for federal AI legislation remains. Congress needs to come together to create a clear set of rules that protect the millions of Americans using AI and the Little Tech builders driving it forward. We @a16z firmly believe a pro-innovation, pro-competition, and pro-consumer federal framework is both possible and essential to keep America ahead of China. States have an important role in addressing harms and protecting people, but they canâ€™t provide the long-term clarity or national direâ€¦

Original: It's time to win AI. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ David Sacks @davidsacks47 Today President Trump signed an Executive Order on â€œEnsuring a National Policy Framework for Artificial Intelligence.â€ This Order declares that the United States must have one â€œminimally burdensome national standardâ€ for AI, not â€œ50 discordant state ones.â€ The Administration will work with Congress to define that standard. The objective is to prevent a confusing regulatory patchwork, while protecting important values like child safety. This Order is not that framework itself, or an amnesty or moratorium, but rather a statement of principles and a set of tools for the Administration to push back on the most onerous and excessive State AI laws.â€¦

Original: It's time to build the US Tech Force. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Scott Kupor @skupor Your government needs YOU to transform the federal government through modern software development. If youâ€™re up for a huge challenge, join 1,000 of the countryâ€™s best and brightest technologists in the inaugural class of @USTechForce . We are partnering with the top U.S. technology companies to take on this challenge. Youâ€™ll learn a ton, network across the most important government agencies and private sector companies, ultimately creating powerful career opportunities whether you want to continue in public service or join the private sector. I am grateful to @POTUS for ensuring that America remains the worldâ€™s technology leader. Gâ€¦
